profile.name: Your Name
profile.title: Aerospace Engineer & UAV Specialist
profile.tagline: Engineering the future of unmanned flight

projects.title: Scaled A350-900 UAV Project
projects.description: Designed and engineered a scaled unmanned aerial vehicle based on the Airbus A350-900, focusing on aerodynamic efficiency and structural integrity. Successfully integrated all electronic and structural components for optimal performance.
achievements: Created full airframe framework using CAD modeling
3D printed detailed aircraft model with precision engineering
Integrated all electronic and structural components
Applied aerospace principles to scaled UAV design

projects.title: Autonomous Flight Control System
projects.description: Developed an autonomous navigation system for UAVs implementing PID controllers and sensor fusion algorithms for stable flight in various conditions.
